article_title: Entries being accepted for poetry, short story writing contest
article_text:

og.description: Washington County Free Library is hosting its annual Poetry&Short Story Writing Contest. There are five age divisions: grades two and three; grades four and five; grades six to eight; grades nine to 12; and adult. Entrants must be residents of Wash
